The first part of the assembly is now complete. The part has a length of approximately 0.75 units, a width of approximately 0.0221 units, and a height of approximately 0.75 units (matching the dimensions given in the description). The part is a rectangular prism with a triangular cutout on one of its faces. Move on to the next part of the assembly. Note: The terms 'NewBodyFeatureOperation', 'CutFeatureOperation', 'IntersectFeatureOperation', and 'JoinFeatureOperation' have not been used to describe the boolean operation of the current part with the previous part. Instead, their natural language descriptions ('create a new solid body', 'cut or remove materials', 'intersect with an existing body', and 'join or add material') are used to maintain clarity and concise instructions.</description>
